titles.title: In The Presence Of A Holy God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In the presence of a holy God, There’s new meaning now to grace. You took all my sins upon Yourself, I can only stand amazed. In the presence of Your infinite might, I’m so small and frail and weak. When I see Your pow’r and wisdom, Lord, I have no words left to speak.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And I cry holy, holy, holy Lord, How awesome is Your name. Holy, holy, holy Lord, How majestic is Your reign. And I am changed in the presence of a holy God.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In the presence of a holy God, All my crowns lie in the dust. You are righteous in Your judgments, Lord, You are faithful, true and just.{/lang-eng}
